long_description: Stay prepared during wilderness adventures with the SOL Pocket Survival Pak Plus. It includes a knife, micro-light, water purification tablets and other outdoor essentials. Survival pack comes with a fixed blade knife, water purification tablets with 1-liter water storage bag, signaling mirror, rescue whistle and fire starter with tinder. Also includes 10 ft. nylon cord, 15 ft. of stainless steel wire, LED micro-light and comprehensive survival instructions written by survival expert Doug Ritter. SOL Pocket Survival Pak Plus is packed in a welded, waterproof pouch with zippered closure; it measures 5.25 x 4.75 in. letting you carry it easily in a jacket or pack pocket.
short_description: Stay prepared during wilderness adventures with the SOL Pocket Survival Pak Plus. It includes a knife, micro-light, water purification tablets and other outdoor essentials.
